name: Pluto Plunder
description:
When a hillbilly robot forages for space gold on Pluto, he quickly discovers the local alien population isn't so friendly. 

Hide from the aliens, they will pursue you if they see you.

Collect enough gold to advance to the next level without getting eaten by the locals!

Controls: WASD to move, point and click to shoot, right click to mine

Credits : 

Artist - [Ryan - itch.io](https://thetidbit.itch.io/) / [Ryan - Twitter](https://twitter.com/NTiddles?s=09)
